name: mesh-background
shortDescription: An animated mesh gradient background component
description: A beautiful, animated mesh gradient background component built with WebGL shaders. Perfect for hero sections, landing pages, and full-screen backgrounds with customizable colors, animation speed, and distortion effects.

name: footer-block
shortDescription: A responsive footer block with columns and decorative elements
description: A beautifully designed footer block with multiple columns, decorative borders, and responsive layout. Features elegant SVG patterns, vertical lines with accent dots, and comprehensive link organization.
